column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////The star of the show though (if you plan your meal properly and save enough room)
column2: is the paella.  My mom was in town last weekend and begged me to take her back to "that amazing paella place."  It takes a while to cook
column3: and they make you order at least two servings
column4: but the servings are huge and I've found that two servings is perfect for four people after having a few small tapas to start with.  I've had the seafood and the chicken paellas and both are phenomenal
column5: just depends on what you're in the mood for!
